snippet: The comforts of two chains of convenience stores — Wawa in the east, and Sheetz to the west — inspire Pennsylvanians to choose sides.
abstract: Two chains of convenience stores in Pennsylvania, Wawa in the eastern part of the state and Sheetz in the west, stir tribal loyalties in Pennsylvanians; customer bonds with one brand over the other are as deep as those of sports fans favoring Philadelphia Phillies or Pittsburgh Pirates.
lead_paragraph: The comforts of two chains of convenience stores — Wawa in the east, and Sheetz to the west — inspire Pennsylvanians to choose sides.

headline.seo: Sheetz and Wawa Divide Pit-Stop Partisans in Pennsylvania
headline.main: Fuel and Food Are Quick, but the Fealty Is Forever
headline.print_headline: Fuel and Food Are Quick, but the Fealty Is Forever
